title.narrative: 3.2. Children have increased access to local protection systems.

description.narrative: UNICEF made significant progress during 2019 in the implementation of a nation-wide Case Management Information System. 16 provinces (out of 24) are actually using UNICEF's locally developed technology for the registration and analysis of intervention made by the provincial child protection agencies (RUN). This tool, and its implementation process, seeks to strengthen local comprehensive child protection systems by improving data generation and creating a management tool to enhance the coordination and evaluation capacity of the State's responses among the various State agents involved in the protection of children's rights. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2019

title.narrative: Municipalities that implement local protocols for the protection of children from violence, abuse and neglect
